= 4 inches 10 cm with lion brand wool-ease chunky yarn weight #5 140g/153yds per skein shawl as shown in pictures required 14 skeins of wool-ease chunky #5 or equivalent weight crochet hook size k issued decrease 21 2009 - lks-001 2 of 5 body make 37 row for 33 inch length from neckline i m showing the row with the number of increases for each row since that helps me keep track i use a flag beside the row i m working on chain 26 make 2 note when adding the 2 double_crochet at end of row i add the extra double_crochet in the next to last stitch and then end the row with a double_crochet this reduces the hole that is often visible when you end a row with an increase row 1 double_crochet in 4th chain from hook and in each chain across turn = 24 double_crochet row 2 chain 3
